description: Enables the operator to record a value returned from a connected device or manually enter a reading.
intent: Capture device readings and store them as recipe variables, ensuring readings are within specified limits and handling manual‐entry exceptions.

outputs.ManualEntry: boolean indicating if the reading was manually entered
outputs.RecordedValue: the value retrieved from the device or entered manually

preconditions: Equipment must be connected and selected
Recipe author must configure Equipment Class and valid Equipment IDs
postconditions: Reading and ManualEntry flag are written to recipe variables
Limit checks are applied and pass/fail status is determined
side_effects: Manual entry generates an exception of type specified by RecordDevice_EXCEPTION_TYPE_MANUAL_ENTRY
example_usage: Operator uses this phase to record a pH meter reading during a unit procedure.
